```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(gh)
library(jsonlite)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(tibble)
library(codetools) # there was a weird error on connect that needed this
library(DT)
library(tidyversedashboard)
library(tidyr)
library(sparkline)
library(ggplot2)
on_macos <- tolower(Sys.info()[["sysname"]]) == "darwin"
gh_colors <- list(
  green = "#2cbe4e",
  red = "#CB2434",
  purple = "#6f42c1")
```

```{r pr_stats, include=FALSE, cache = on_macos}
options(repos = c(CRAN='https://cloud.r-project.org'))

pr_data <- bind_rows(
  org_pr("r-lib"),
  org_pr("tidyverse"),
  org_pr("r-dbi"))

prs <- pr_data %>%
  filter(created > today() - ddays(30)) %>%
  select(repo, number, author, reviewer) %>%
  filter(is.na(reviewer) | author != reviewer) %>%
  unique()

pr_authors <- prs %>% select(-reviewer) %>% unique() %>% group_by(author)
pr_reviewers <- prs %>% select(-author) %>% unique() %>% group_by(reviewer)
pr_pairs <- prs %>% na.omit() %>% group_by(author, reviewer) %>% tally(sort = TRUE)
```

```{r repo_stats, include = FALSE, cache = on_macos}
issue_data <- list(
  org_data("tidyverse"),
  org_data("r-lib"),
  org_data("r-dbi"))
repo_summary <- map_dfr(issue_data, "summary")
issues <- map_dfr(issue_data, "issues")
```


Issue status summary
=====================================
```{r weekly_summary, cache = on_macos, include = FALSE}
start <- today() - dweeks(1)
weekly_issue_data <- bind_rows(
  weekly_issues("tidyverse", start),
  weekly_issues("r-lib", start),
  weekly_issues("r-dbi", start))

weekly_issue_data2 <- weekly_issue_data %>% 
  mutate(
    type = factor(levels = c("issue", "pull_request"),
      case_when(
        type == "Issue" ~ "issue",
        type == "PullRequest" ~ "pull_request")),

    status = factor(levels = c("opened", "closed", "merged"),
      case_when(
        merged >= start ~ "merged",
        closed >= start ~ "closed",
        opened >= start ~ "opened",
        TRUE ~ NA_character_)),
    event = case_when(
      status == "merged" ~ merged,
      status == "closed" ~ closed,
      status == "opened" ~ opened)
  )
```

````{r}
totals <- weekly_issue_data2 %>% group_by(type, status) %>% tally() %>% na.omit()
```

Row
------------------------------

### Issues opened
```{r}
valueBox(totals %>% filter(type == "issue", status == "opened") %>% pull("n"), icon = "fa-exclamation-circle", color = gh_colors$green)
```

### Issues closed
```{r}
valueBox(totals %>% filter(type == "issue", status == "closed") %>% pull("n"), icon = "fa-times-circle", color = gh_colors$red)
```

### Pull requests merged
```{r}
valueBox(totals %>% filter(type == "pull_request", status == "merged") %>% pull("n"), icon = "ion-merge", color = gh_colors$purple)
```


Row
-------------------------------------

### Weekly table

```{r}
weekly_tab <- weekly_issue_data2 %>%
  group_by(owner,package,type,status) %>%
  tally(sort = TRUE) %>%
  na.omit()

data_table(weekly_tab)
```

### Issue status

```{r}
res <- weekly_issue_data2 %>%
  group_by(type, status) %>%
  arrange(event) %>%
  mutate(count = seq_along(number)) %>%
  select(event, count, status, type) %>%
  na.omit()

ggplot(res, aes(event, count, color = status, linetype = type)) +
  geom_line() +
  # These are the colors used for these states on GitHub
  scale_color_manual(values = c(opened = gh_colors$green, closed = gh_colors$red, merged = gh_colors$purple))
```

Repository statistics
=====================================
```{r repo_summary, cache = on_macos}
summary_table <- repo_summary %>%
  rename("\U1F44D" = p1, "package" = "repo") %>%
  mutate(
    weekly_downloads = num_downloads(.$package, "last-week"),
    maintainer = desc_maintainer(description),
    reverse_deps = reverse_dependencies(package),
    dev_deps = desc_dev_deps(description),
    activity = map2(owner, package, weekly_commits)) %>%
  select(owner, package, maintainer, watchers, reverse_deps, weekly_downloads, open_issues, prs, "\U1F44D", everything(), -description)
```

```{r}
# A custom datatable with a sparkline column
dt <- data_table(summary_table, escape = FALSE,
  options = list(
    columnDefs = list(
      list(
        targets = which(colnames(summary_table) == "activity") - 1L,
        render = JS("
          function(data, type, row, meta) {
            return '<span class=spark>' + data + '</span>'
          }"))),
    fnDrawCallback = JS("
      function (oSettings, json) { $('.spark:not(:has(canvas))').sparkline('html', {width: '100px', lineColor: '#DCAB49', fillColor: '#DBDED3', spotColor: '', minSpotColor: '', maxSpotColor: ''}) }")))
dt$dependencies <- append(dt$dependencies, htmlwidgets::getDependency("sparkline"))
dt
```

Open issues
=====================================
```{r issue_summary}
substitute_emoji <- function(x) {
  m <- gregexpr(":[^[:space:]]+:", x)

  regmatches(x, m) <- lapply(regmatches(x, m), function(xx) map_chr(gsub(":", "", xx), emo::ji))
  x
}

# linkify the titles, and replace emoji
issue_table <- mutate(issues,
  title = glue::glue('<a href="https://github.com/{owner}/{repo}/issues/{issue}">{title}</a>'),
  labels = substitute_emoji(map_chr(labels, paste, collapse = ", "))) %>%
  rename("\U1F44D" = p1)

data_table(issue_table, escape = -4)
```
